title: IMF converter
content:
Hi m8,

Do you know a converter for IMF to Wav file or other. I got a converter (imf2wav) via google, but it makes a bad Wav file. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:">

Thanks you,

JD

title: Re: IMF converter
content:
it's simple.
just fix your software mixer to record everything that you play on your computer and use some tool for recording it to a wav.

i myself use [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/audition/main.html]Adobe Audition[/url] for such tasks but i'm sure there are other similar programs that you can use too.

title: Re: IMF converter
content:
An IMF2WAV converter would have little use when, as DSL said, you can just record your computer playing them. I use [url=http://www.winamp.com]Winamp[/url] to create wav files of IMFs, S3Ms, M4As and the like.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: IMF converter
content:
I use modplug to fiddle most of my audio files.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: IMF converter
content:
Thank you all,

I will see to use Winamp to save a Wav File of IMF file.

:-)

title: hey
content:
Hey, speaking of converting IMFs, someone posted a tool before the board crash which helped convert MID's into IMFs, and I thought it'd be cool to have some changed music in XkyKeen4/5/6... but I don't have the tool any more, and I don't even know where to begin importing music.

Anybody got info?

title: Re: hey
content:
A quick bit of Googling of "imf mid music" gave me a tutorial called "[url=http://www.wolfenstein3d.co.uk/sounds-music.htm]Replacing music[/url]" at "The Wolfenstein 3D Dome".
Basically it tells you: MID -> MUS -> IMF using IMFTools.
You can find IMFTools [url=http://cosmicoding.tripod.com/misc/kdl.html]here[/url].
I didn't try it myself... I don't think it's possible to actually import IMF files into Keen, but I could very well be wrong.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
